'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a building in [Tikawara](/tikawara/).

## Background

A small hut in Tikawara, serving as the residence of the local chief.

## Characters

* [Ranga Ruānu](/rangaRuanu/), chieftain of the tribe

## Gallery

<gallery mode=nolines widths=200px>
PE2 Tikawara Chieftain's Lodge Exterior.png | Building exterior
</gallery>
